feed.title: GitHub Bicep Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of Bicep in GitHub

entry.title: Azure/bicep
entry.summary: Bicep is a declarative language for describing and deploying Azure resources

entry.title: Azure/reddog-containerapps
entry.summary: Azure Container App implementation of the reddog demo, brought to you by the Cloud Native Global Black Belt Team.

entry.title: Azure/ResourceModules
entry.summary: This repository includes a CI platform for and collection of mature and curated Bicep modules. The platform supports both ARM and Bicep and can be leveraged using GitHub actions as well as Azure DevOps pipelines.

entry.title: Azure/ALZ-Bicep
entry.summary: This repository contains the Azure Landing Zones (ALZ) Bicep modules that help deliver and deploy the Azure Landing Zone conceptual architecture in a modular approach. https://aka.ms/alz/docs
